_note1: The key below is used for Skyport Daemon to access the Panel to retrieve images and instances. You can set this key (temporarily) in your Panel's config.json file.
_note2: This is the 2nd key, used by the Panel for accessing the Daemon (also temporarily). You should set this as the key when you create a node on your Panel.
_note3: Other configuration options below. Hostname must be set for FTP to return the correct info.
